授業目的: To give opportunities for students to have in-depth discussions with executives from well-known financial institutions. Students are expected to learn how financial theories are actually deployed in real-world situations.
到達目標: Students will be expected to have a deeper understanding of financial theory and how they are used in a real-world situation.
特記事項: 【合併】Special Topics in Finance（経営戦略研究科）/Special Topics in Finance（経営戦略研究科）

Face-to-face (Online participation is only allowed for students with prior approval by the vice dean of the school)
Discussions with financial professionals. Topics will vary depending on the interests of students.
